document.full_text: a man acting erratically near a virginia nuclear power plant was detained by police on friday and was found to be carrying a black box of harmless wet sand chained to his neck, authorities said.
document.title: man near nuclear plant was not a threat: police
lines_and_colors: a man acting erratically near a virginia nuclear power plant was detained by police on friday and was found to be carrying a black box of harmless wet sand chained to his neck, authorities said.
